revisions.rev: {{Orphan|date=June 2009}} {{NCAATeamSeason |Mode=Basketball |sex=women |Year=2008-09 |Prev year=2007-08 |Next year=2009-10 |Team=South Florida Bulls |Conference=Big East |ShortConference=Big East |CoachRank= |APRank= |Record=27-10 |ConfRecord= |HeadCoach=Jose Fernandez |AsstCoach1=Jeff Osterman |AsstCoach2=Andrea Williams |AsstCoach3= Michele Woods-Baxter |StadiumArena= [[USF Sun Dome]] |Champion=USF Shootout |BowlTourney=[[2009 Women's National Invitation Tournament]] |BowlTourneyResult= Champions }} The '''2008â09 South Florida Bulls women's basketball team''' represented the [[University of South Florida]] in the 2008â09 NCAA Division I women's basketball season. The Bulls ended the season with 27 wins and the 27th win of the season for the Bulls was the best in USF history - for men or women - and the highest win total by any Division I team in the state of Florida. USF capped their sixth postseason appearance by winning the 2009 WNIT Tournament.http://www.gousfbulls.com/ViewArticle.dbml?SPSID=36696&SPID=2924&DB_OEM_ID=7700&ATCLID=3707214 ==Exhibition==
